attributes.action: stop non vital services done by the nhs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The NHS is in a very, very bad state but still in stead of focusing on essental services, such as real emergenies. 
to much money is being wasted on treatment such as ivf, cosmetic sergery, ect. what should happen is a council should  deside what is needed and what is not. all outpatent none life threating treatment should be picked up by local concil.
